# MPSImageAreaMin

**Class**

A filter that finds the minimum pixel value in a rectangular region centered around each pixel in the source image.

## Declaration

```swift
class MPSImageAreaMin
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImageAreaMin] filter has the same methods and properties as the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImageAreaMax] class.

If there are multiple channels in the source image, each channel is processed independently. The [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSUnaryImageKernel/edgeMode] property value is assumed to always be [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImageEdgeMode/clamp] for this filter.

## Morphological Image Filters

- **MPSImageAreaMax**: A filter that finds the maximum pixel value in a rectangular region centered around each pixel in the source image.
- **MPSImageDilate**: A filter that finds the maximum pixel value in a rectangular region by applying a dilation function.
- **MPSImageErode**: A filter that finds the minimum pixel value in a rectangular region by applying an erosion function.
